page.title: 19HOUSING IN S.HARRIS
page.content: {HOUSING The majority of houses in the area are croft houses built mostly by the crofters themselves in the early 1900's but they have been renovated in the past 10 to 20 years.Government grants are available to help buy material and pay for renovation. In{FINSBAY}, Cnoc nan Leac,and in{ {NORTHTON},Grianary, there are 6 new council houses rented out to tenants by the{Western Isles Council. In {LEVERBURGH},Dunmore Crescent, there are 18 council houses built about 1950.These are timber houses not the traditional style of stone built houses.There are also 6 old peoples houses in{OBBE ROAD}.
